txt.en: Wights to the Right, Wights to the Left

The Greenway is an ancient road from Bree-land, north of Cardolan, to Tharbad in Cardolan's southern region. Travel has always been difficult along its broken stones, but even more so in recent days, thanks to the dangerous spirits that haunt the ruins along the roadside.

'Brigands may have landed us where we are now, but our way south is impeded as well. There are ruins on either side of the Greenway, and of late they have become infested with the risen Dead. If you could put these spirits back to rest, it would aid us immensely in our travels.'
You should let Coel know that you have defeated many wights.\n\nCoel is in the caravan, south of Andrath in northern Cardolan.
Coel has asked you to defeat wights in the ruins along the Greenway.\n\nWights can be found in Dol Ernil and Gond Orchal, in north-eastern Cardolan.
'I must admit, I did not expect you to return. ...Ah, so quickly, that is.\n\n'Truly our progress is blessed to have had someone like you come along.'
